title: findMaximum does not work - describe conditions

content.question: The method works as intended for some, but not all, int arrays. Which of the following best describes the conditions in which the method does not return the intended result?

choices.label: When the maximum value in numbers is the first element in the array
When the maximum value in numbers appears multiple times in the array
When the maximum value in numbers is negative
When the maximum value in numbers is Integer.MAX_VALUE

content.answer: When the maximum value in numbers is negative

skill.text: 4.B: Describe the initial conditions that must be met for a code segment to work as intended or described.
